bill.title: Relating to costs for moderate income modular housing; declaring an emergency.
bill.description: Requires Oregon Department of Administrative Services to provide grant and loan to specified entity to develop multifamily dwellings, affordable to moderate income families, using scaled modular or prefabricated construction. Requires Oregon Department of Administrative Services to provide grant and loan to specified entity to develop multifamily dwellings, affordable to moderate income families, using scaled modular or prefabricated construction. Requires report to department on or before September 15, 2025. Appropriates moneys from General Fund to department for loan and grant. Sunsets January 2, 2026. Declares emergency, effective July 1, 2023.

history.action: Introduction and first reading. Referred to President's desk.
Referred to Housing and Development, then Ways and Means.

calendar.description: Senate Housing and Development Public Hearing
